autolife_j240322_[1717-1746]: In the late afternoon, the user studies and works at the HKUST campus. Afterward, they take a bus to the Hang Hau transportation hub for transit.
In the late afternoon, the user studies and works at the HKUST. Afterward, they travel by bus to the Hang Hau transportation hub to catch a transit.
autolife_j240322_[1747-1804]: In the late afternoon, the user travels from Hang Hau Station to Po Lam Station by MTR, then walks to the MCP Central shopping mall.
In the late afternoon, the user takes the MTR from Hang Hau Station to Po Lam Station, and then walks to the MCP Central shopping mall.
